news.title: Approach used to conduct meta-analyses may affect outcomes
news.summary: Depending on the analysis strategy used, estimating treatment outcomes in meta­analyses may differ and may result in major alterations in the conclusions derived from the analysis, according to a study in the August 13 issue of JAMA.

news.title: Approach Used to Conduct Meta-Analyses May Affect Outcomes
news.summary: Depending on the analysis strategy used, estimating treatment outcomes in meta­analyses may differ and may result in major alterations in the conclusions derived from the analysis, according to a study in the August 13 issue of JAMA.

news.title: Approach Used to Conduct Meta-analyses May Affect Outcomes
news.summary: Depending on the analysis strategy used, estimating treatment outcomes in meta­analyses may differ and may result in major alterations in the conclusions derived from the analysis, according to a study in the August 13 issue of JAMA.

news.title: Estimating Treatment Outcomes in Meta-Analyses Depends on the Approach Used
news.summary: A new study published in JAMA reveals that estimating the treatment outcomes in meta-analyses depends significantly on the method of analysis strategy used and could lead to major alterations in the conclusions derived from the analysis. Meta-analyses of r
